title: Really cute 😍
text:
[[VIDEOID:caed7838ddcf0e22e796a23ed11019dd]] What can you say? This is such a cute toy! It's made well, zipper functions- doesn't get stuck, and it comes with unicorn babies in the tummy!!
Kids just love playing with it.

title: Cover is pretty, but...
text: I used to buy these pads locally but cannot find them anymore, so I was excited when I saw it on Amazon. The cover design is nice but the strap is too tight and warped the pages and the plastic sleeve insert that should hold cards or paper was torn at the bottom so everything just falls out...

title: Awesome toy for kids!
text: Much bigger than I thought- the boys had a blast playing doctor and "driving" to scene in their ambulance! Lol

title: Snowball gun really works!
text:
We had a light dusting of snow the other day, so we tried out the gun- there is a ball mold on the top- add snow- make a ball and put it in the launcher!
Kids had a blast- now we need more snow to build an army of penguins!!

title: Fun game!
text: My family loved this game, but the game box did come damaged in one corner which was unfortunate.

title: Totally awesome 🚀
text:
[[VIDEOID:4a8b774f9733b55ffe605cdf34f23da5]] The kids loved this toy! Works great- really shoots the rockets right up in the air.
Eventually, I had to put away so they would stop shooting it in the house Lol!
But come summer they will have a blast playing with it outside.

title: Very educational toy!
text:
[[VIDEOID:16e86743e998eeded5835a7dcf23cd19]] Love these kinds of toys for the kids, gets them away from tablets and TV.
Teaches them cognitive function by learning to build all the while having fun doing so!
This kit also has multiple ways it can go together so that's a bonus, and for the price, the pieces are nice and not a cheap quality.

title: Adorable!
text:
Highly recommend this ice cream shop, the kids love playing with it- even my 11 year old got in there and was making ice cream!
It comes with a nice printed menu you can choose your flavors and toppings, and a scooper that really picks up the ice cream and puts it in a bowl or cone.
Even comes with play money the kids can use! Overall, a ton of fun.

title: Nice kit for a school project
text:
This shipped quickly which was great because my son needed a chassis kit for an upcoming school project in a pinch.
Was very easy to use and he was able to hook up his electronics to make his project come to life!

title: Realistic toys!
text:
These Disney mini toys are very realistic, they are not just empty boxes- most are actual plastic toys!
The kids love them ❤️

title: So fun to build!
text:
[[VIDEOID:89a4ca72ad2336d37125d2e26688539a]] This set was as much fun to build as to play with!
Instructions read step-by-step and are very simple to follow.
Took the kids about an hour to assemble.
The store itself is stable and the shelves can be adjusted to the height of your mini fig.

title: Not that happy with it
text: Now that summer is almost over most of the toys that came with the set are broken and in the trash-  as for the sparkly pieces in the bag they were a lot smaller than I anticipated.

title: Ok addition
text: This is an add on piece so you need the original set first but for the price the kids weren't impressed...

title: Cute game
text: This was a good game for the kids to play in the car, wish it had more pieces and options available.

title: Nice for a gift
text: This is a cute die set for an anniversary gift, dice are very heavy and easily readable. Just which the sayings weren't so corny...

title: So soft!!!
text:
Just adorable!
My 3 year old has a small stuffed dalmatian toy so I found this pillow to go along with it, he loves it- has been sleeping with it every night!

title: Very steady
text:
[[VIDEOID:51dfadc39610a7f5c45e6d059ded0265]] Pretty sweet drone for first time users!

Definitely watch the videos they recommend, shows you how to calibrate the GPS before you fly it.

So far the few times we took this out to the field, even on windy days it has flown with ease.

As for the VR goggles- they work, and if your struggling to get a picture just change the channel.

I just bought a SD card for it so now we have to check out the picture and video quality on our next flight.

title: So much fun!
text:
[[VIDEOID:ee85041317ab08b2634595cee8a09722]] The kids just love playing with these gel blasters- definitely a go to this summer.
This particular gun has a long battery life and a far shot!
We set up target practice and they had fun seeing who could tear a hole through the paper first!

title: Very durable
text: Cute play balls for either a ball pit or whatever your child can imagine- mine likes to fill his train table up and drive cars thru them! 🙂😅

title: Just so so...
text: This was a 2 pack but one of the balls came with a hole in it so it was garbage, the other one seems to be holding up.

title: Great for ammo!
text: Wow! This makes a ton of water beads! They are the perfect size for gel blasters.

title: Cute cars
text: Got these to go along with a wooden train set, while they are colorful, one of the wheels was broken and they don't quite fit on the track evenly.

title: Couldn't stop playing with it!
text:
[[VIDEOID:bf1989bd294cdf7cea2e0d6fef7abd65]] If your looking for a gel blaster, look no further! This gun is on the smaller side but packs a punch.

Comes with an extra battery but they last a long time anyways, and 20k water beads.
Only took a few hours for them to grow, load them in the barrel and off you go.

It has a semi and auto shot, the auto shot seems to go farther but the semi is more fun- plus it still has good distance.
Overall we had a blast playing with it, now I'm off to buy more water beads!! 🤣

title: Fascinating set!
text: This is a fun way for kids to learn how to make things, we pulled this set out on a rainy afternoon and the kids had so much fun making water beads- plus, it keep them busy for a few hours! 😉

title: Teaches them balance
text:
Good outdoor toy for the summer, kids get exercise plus, it teaches them how to balance.
It comes with a hand pump that works well, just insert the ball into the hole and fill with air- then hop on and have fun!

title: Fun for kids and dogs!
text:
Antsy Pants has a good line up of "get your kids moving" items, and this tunnel is a good example.
You just pop it open and let the fun begin!
In our household, it's not only for the kiddos but the dogs love to play peekaboo with each other as well.

title: Adorable  🚉 🚄
text:
[[VIDEOID:70b78de1d07c965d862e7b0978156c74]] First off, I was impressed with the wood material used on this train table, it is thick but the edges are smooth so you won't get a splinter while playing.

It comes with a printed top with a cute playing area and plenty of pieces to make your own track.

I also bought other wood train cars individually and was able to add them to this set for additional fun and they fit perfectly 🥰

title: Cute car toys
text:
Good value for what you get, the cars are cute plus after you pull them back they release really fast.
There could have been a better variety in car choice though...

title: Cute brick toy
text: These are just like Lego, easy to snap together but you do get repeating dinosaurs, thought there would be more of a variety...

title: Definitely amphibious! 💧
text:
[[VIDEOID:cce7632e9a0d39beb5e3489423885ace]] We had a blast at the beach with this remote control truck!
Charge time is quick and the battery seemed to last forever, it never ran out while the kids were playing.
As for it being waterproof, it definitely is!
We drove it right into the water and it kept on truckin 🛻 🙂

title: So fast!!! 🏎 🏁
text:
[[VIDEOID:610d03ec4731216b494da49d1bf1ec63]] If your looking for a high speed remote control car, look no further! This car is super fast!
We took it out right after it rained, and because it's waterproof it drove through puddles with no problem.
And you also get an extra battery, which is awesome so you can prolong play time.
As for handling, it is pretty good, even at high speeds.

title: Fun to play with!
text: [[VIDEOID:9dbf0f3dce8f379f9e998da987ce010e]] Tons of fun for kids, they are brightly colored and easy to assemble into shapes!

title: Just adorable
text: Would make a great gift for anyone that owns German shorthaired Pointers, the toy is cute and well made.

title: Not a good value
text: I know this is a hard to find item but I way overpaid for it here, you only get one small card, not worth the price...

title: Keeps little fingers busy
text: [[VIDEOID:18dd8322729ae2d4416ed92b724e5835]] Super cute idea for young kids, this is a great way to keep them entertained while riding in the car.

title: Little pricey for what it does
text:
Don't get me wrong this is a cute toy but I recently gifted this to my 4 year old nephew who had a hard time trying to push it and work the mechanism to chomp or pick up the car's through its mouth.
We were even struggling trying to get it to work as adults.
So this would be better suited for older children.

title: Lovely sunset 🌇!
text:
[[VIDEOID:9d01861789449863b01e63acd604f5a3]] As a family we love to do puzzles but I wanted one for myself that would be a challenge, and this is it!

Not only do the pieces snap together well they are printed with beautiful colors- I can't wait to see the finished product- but for now I'm having fun putting it together! ❤

title: Fun for everyone!
text: The whole family had fun with this at Christmas, very easy to snap the pieces together to make the target and the balls shoot out by pushing air in the tube- fun for all ages!

title: Tons of options!
text: [[VIDEOID:445390e6a01be20387f6775eaf29304e]] Tons of puzzles in one box! So many age choices ranging from kids to adults.

title: Decent set
text:
This was a recent birthday present, which didn't go over too well.
This set could have come with more options, and more pieces. It was pretty basic. Being a police set was the only cool aspect.

title: Fun toy!
text: [[VIDEOID:1399bb986a516b1a844423006d548657]] Fun interactive toy- keeps little fingers busy!

title: Cute for a gift
text: Seem well made and giftable- I was just hoping they would have been a little larger.

title: Got to have extra boats!
text: I bought these boats to go along with the Zuru boat race track, they are water activated so you don't need to worry about remotes or batteries which it makes this toy fun for the younger kids.

title: Who doesn't love a water toy!?
text:
[[VIDEOID:cce33f6d93000922038c4adf0b2d5489]] Love this brand for kids toys- they are always so creative and fun!
This one is a race track for boats, it holds water and doesn't leak so you can play with it indoors- kids have a blast with it.

title: Super fast!
text: [[VIDEOID:30b94842f25833365a0f5386d3d6a832]] Cool toy! Easy set up and the cars stay on the track and go really fast! 🏁

title: Challenging!
text:
Very nice puzzle, plus it's a 2-1! So far it's hard, which we enjoy a good challenge.
And you get felt trays as a bonus to sort and keep pieces separated while working on it.

title: Multiple options for fun!
text:
Can't wait for Christmas- this is going to be a present. He loves anything Nerf brand and when I saw this I couldn't pass it up!
It is a decent size scooter- has nice weight and is very sturdy.
The features of it shooting darts as you ride is so fun - can't wait to see his face when he opens it!

title: Dinosaurs roar! 🦕
text:
[[VIDEOID:da20fa016d35100e063ca4f10ccbe844]] Cute toy for younger kids- provides hours of entertainment!
Not only does it come with a truck that plays music, you also get an array of dinosaur figures.

title: Hilarious
text:
This a great gag gift, I recently gifted this and they really believed it was a puzzle! 😆🤣
My only issue was that I had to tape the sides shut to keep them from opening- but it was worth it.

title: Very versatile
text: The kids are always making a mess with puzzles or Lego, so I got these trays to help them organize play time, they work out great because you can collapse them when done for easy storing.

title: Great for game night!
text:
[[VIDEOID:5a7995b9f504337db73ca6ea43a316b1]] We always try to have a family game night at least once a week and I thought this would be a fun option to write the choices of the games on and the kids could spin it to pick the game for the evening.
It was pretty easy to build and very sturdy, I love the clicking noise as it spins around!
Was almost impossible to get the kids to stop playing with it and focus on the game at hand 🤣🙂

title: Bubbles, bubbles everywhere!
text:
My son needed a bubble blower for a school project and this one worked out just fine.
Nice bright color, sturdy plastic and blows lots of bubbles.
Conveniently also comes with extra solution.

title: Cute, but too small
text: Was going to use these to pass out Halloween candy - but even though they are bright colors they are way too small to hold any substantial amount of candy...

title: Bounce your way to fun!
text:
[[VIDEOID:d3396d3484e757b7d0b1c03005d5cb55]] If a 5 year can master this game, anyone can!
We really enjoy playing it but unfortunately the kids are better than the parents- I think it's from all that bottle flipping experience! 🤣

Overall, super fun game to play and easy to set up.

title: Kids love it!
text: [[VIDEOID:b58d8ff6a41d902c4fd11d52c00ca80c]] Great assortment of fidget toys for your whole family, I like to have some on hand for the kids for rewards because they love playing with them so much.

title: Fun book 📖 😀
text:
[[VIDEOID:598f623b9473137356e07a6499254918]] Was a gift for my niece, she loved it!
It is very interactive, has a ton of play along options while your reading the story.

title: Ready, set, launch 🚀
text:
So cute, this is the small size on a 5 year old, fit is perfect!
I suggest adding a stuffing in the top piece to make it stand up better, other than that it is an awesome costume!

title: So cool and fun for the kids!
text:
Don't know who likes this more, the kids, dogs, or the parents!
Really fun to play with - we had another version in the past where the blades were exposed and it scared the kids, this one is such a nice update with everything enclosed in the cage- no more boo boos!
And you shake to start it and off it goes, the kids love chasing it around 🌐🛸!

title: So tiny!
text: Just love the animal pieces! Took a few hours to put together, the pieces are very small so it's a nice challenging puzzle.

title: Hilarious!
text:
These are hysterical! They really work! You toss it at the wall and they climb down!
The kids like to have races to see who's falls first 🙂

title: Doesn't sink! 🙂
text:
[[VIDEOID:1009025461286865a021fca0bb4ef1a8]] Lol, this shark is a lots of fun!
Originally bought it for the kids to play with in the kiddie pool but the dogs seem to enjoy it even more!
They like chasing it around and no matter how many times they bat at it, it doesn't sink!
Battery life is decent as well for the time they want to play with it- no issues there.

title: Entertaining
text:
Cute games for a younger audience, the water shooter game even held the attention of an older kid!
I like the fact you can empty the water out when not in use that way it doesn't get moldy.

title: Good for little hands
text: Cute game for young children, the wood pieces are bright and made well - no sharp edges.

title: Fun!
text:
[[VIDEOID:8e20f58b6b53f24252d13e8b1c1fd083]] Very competitive game!

You need speed and precision to beat your opponent- ok, so we bought this for the kids but it's great fun for adults too!

title: So fun!
text:
Wow 😮!
Really works! The kids have a blast with this race track, pretty easy to build- took a little time but that's ok- time spent with the family is great.
Then just rev the cars up and by some magnetic magic off they go!
Plus, the cars and track are a nice bright color so it looks really cool as well.

title: Who's up for a game!?
text:
Easy to blow up toys for fun for the whole family!
You can even set these up out of water so the kids can play with it on the grass- they are very durable so far - no leaks!

title: Good set for your money
text: Nice set of diving toys, you get a good variety and they sink in water 💧😀!

title: Nice sandbox
text: With the Little Tikes name you can't go wrong, this sandbox is made well but I thought it was going to be a little bigger, but the kids are happy...

title: Great colors- they really stand out!
text:
Easy to blow up cornhole boards for the kids to play with in the backyard.
The plastic seems really thick so it should last with wear and tear.
Can't wait to throw it in the pool this summer for even more fun!

title: Fun game!
text:
This is a great family game!
The pieces are made well, no sharp corners, plus you can play it outside even.
And it comes with a storage bag which is an added bonus 🙂

title: Cute!
text: Perfect beach toys for kids, work well in sand and I love the fact they come in their own bag for easy storage. ⛱

title: Adorable!
text: Was a present for my niece who loves stuffed animals, I thought this one was unique plus it's so cute!

title: Awesome digger! 🚧 👷‍♂️ 🏗
text:
Easy to put together, kids can sit on the seat and hand work the digger- can't wait to use it in the summer in the sand box or at the beach.
Made really well, strong and sturdy.

title: Cute... but...
text: These were cute antlers but they did not stay up on my dogs head, her head is very slim so might be better on a bulky dog.

title: Sweet truck! 🚚
text:
[[VIDEOID:918e6bed6b33c60d280cc9d1d70e4b43]] The kids love this army truck, I really like the headlights -they work really cool in the dark.
And it's a great size for them to play with to drive things around in the back of the bed area.
Comes with an extra battery so you can use it longer in charge one while you are playing with the other one.

title: More the better!
text:
Fun toy to keep kids occupied, these magnetic toys are part of our car riding options because they keep their hands busy!
The magnetic really holds them together and the kids can spin them on their fingers- awesome fidget toy.

title: Excellent value pack!
text:
You get a lot of bang for your buck!
Tons of fun things you can make out of these glow sticks because they also come with extenders to make necklaces, glasses, etc...

title: Just an okay updated game
text: My parents were hoping this was going to be like the classic game but it has a lot of differences. One of the problems with the update is the number and letters are hard to read- could have been solved with lighting up the background.

title: So cool 😎
text:
Can't wait to take this to the beach 🏖
Easy to put together and the kids are excited to use it, right now they are scooping up toys around the house just waiting for summer!
It has a handle on the seat for easy carrying and it is actually pretty light so it won't be hard to travel with it.

title: So worth it! 🚛
text:
[[VIDEOID:a6db695f10757d687c1bec2a079d5b34]] Even though this was pricey it was worth the joy on my nephew's face 🙂
He loves trucks and wanted a BIG one for Christmas and that's what he got!
We built it beforehand and it was pretty straight forward- the instructions were just ok to follow, you do end up with a lot of extra washers...
The things I love are- it's size, it's huge! The doors work easily so they can climb right into the cab, the stickers were surprisingly easy to put on and it's fast, I mean for a toy this size it really moves!
The only things I can see areas of improvement are it needs a cab light- the cab is so big and in the evening it's hard to see in there- so we added a stick on light on the ceiling!
Also, the music could be louder but the kids really don't mind- overall it's definitely worth it!

title: More than a bank! 🏦
text:
Cute idea to start kids off on learning to save money at a young age.
This is a present for a 5 year really into anything Police related so I'm excited I found it. It also plays music and you can play with it like a toy car in addition to it also being a piggy bank.

title: For adults! (And kids...!) 🙂
text:
[[VIDEOID:7296a94b054c17b8e8c6b545ae8ffc58]] So I know this is for kids but let me tell you it's fun for anyone!!
Was so happy that it worked first of all but trying to shoot the floating balls is such a great challenging game!
We just need to stop the dogs from stealing the balls before we can shoot them! 🤣

title: Get that COVID-19!
text:
Fun game for the kids to play indoors or out when the weather is nicer.
Easy to setup- you just connect the frame together and the fact that there are viruses on the board is kinda funny! But a good target game for sure!

A great way to pass time! All you do it step or jump on it and the rockets shoot up!
I even let the kids play with it in the house because they are foam and they don't hurt anything.

title: Pretty durable
text:
We had one a long time ago that popped so I was looking for a replacement for the kids for Christmas.
I inflated this one before I wrapped it and seems pretty durable. The actual inflating part could have been easier but maybe it's just me.
Plus the color is bright and fun, can't wait for her to bounce on it 💗

title: Fits with other sets
text:
Great product- really nice box that it came in- can use it for storage.
The pieces are made well and the magnetic quality it not wimpy at all.
Plus this set hooks up to others we have to do can build long tube slides or tunnels.
Took a while to apply all the stickers but it was worth it- the kids enjoy it so much.

title: So I scratched it a little... he he!
text:
This is going to be a Christmas gift for my niece and I love the fact it comes with a lot of accessories.
And while wrapping it up the other day I just had to sneak and scratch one of the sheets a little and wow it really works and looks to be a lot of fun! 🌈

title: Love the sirens! 🚨
text:
[[VIDEOID:146f8ed9a925c76994fb89c868918455]] Going to be a present today for my nephew who is obsessed with anything Police related.
Can't wait for him to see it! Pretty easy to build, my husband struggled a little, lol. But it was worth it.
It drives fairly fast plus has a remote parents can use instead of children.
My favorite part is the siren! And it even has a handheld megaphone you can talk into to so you can pull people over and give them tickets!!

title: Easy to build
text:
Good product for younger kids.
The pieces are made well - the color is bright and eye-catching!
And they just snap together to make whatever your child can think of- comes with a book with example patterns if you need that.

[[VIDEOID:da41be0ad899193e0fa50b58504b1994]] Love these toys! Especially as gifts for other parents! 😉
The hamster is cute and repeats everything! And come on- How adorable is the little hat and scarf?!
Really nice gift for kids.

title: So cute!
text:
This is going to be a Christmas present but I opened it to make sure everything was there and it works.
I can't wait for her to play with it! It has awesome features such as jump, stand up, sit, etc.... The remote works well plus you can have it follow you just like a real dog, and it has these bone chips you can program to do even more stuff 🥰

title: Nice for our Christmas display
text: Needed a new Santa for our display and this one was so cute with the reindeer I couldn't pass it up plus it gives the kids something to build.

title: A lot of fun!
text:
Ok ok, so really this is a gift for my in laws but when it came I just had to open and try it out!
Let's say I was just making sure all the pieces were there 😉... Ya, I'll go with that 😂
Me and kids couldn't stop playing! So easy to snap together and the oversized pieces are just awesome.
I can't wait for them to see it and hopefully by next summer Covid will be over and we can have outdoor parties again!

title: Cute game
text: Going to be a Christmas present for my niece in Preschool, looks to be made well and will be a fun learning game.

title: So fun! 🥰
text:
[[VIDEOID:94caa493c0137a0ac5f5dc91bc39707f]] With the nice weather this week I wanted to give the kids a surprise and open up this bounce house, they were thrilled!
All you need is a plug! Just tie the long piece to the blower and turn it on. It inflates in seconds!
I highly recommend this house if you have kids that just love to bounce!

title: Family backyard adventure!
text:
Our local park had a zipline put in a few years ago and with COVID-19 it's been hard to get to the park and the kids miss it. So I never even thought of getting our own until I saw it on Amazon one day.

I gotta be honest, I think we had more fun trying to install it than anything else 🤣. By the time we found the proper trees and distance we were already having a blast!

The kit comes with everything you need, it's actually a pretty easy install you just need the space and stable trees 🌳.

For now we are going to leave it up until winter because the kids run out there a few times a day and go for a ride!

title: Blow-up blast!
text:
[[VIDEOID:195bb1ccec7085d331a0d4693e0e9450]] Almost as good a going to the fair!

The kids have been bored since Covid, so I splurged and got them this bounce house.

Came quick, had to wait for good weather and last weekend was perfect.
Set up was a breeze, lay it out- attach tube to the air blower, and then stake it down.
Instructions say takes 2 min to blow up but I swear it was up under 30 seconds!

That's it- ready to go! I was afraid the kids would be too heavy but they weren't, even my older son was able to jump because their is no roof.

Take down was easy too, after deflating it comes with a carrying case which is really big.

It's made really well as far as I can tell, hope it lasts 5+years!

title: Poorly Made, no quality check. Wish I could return or get better set
text:
Overall- okay if you're very gentle with the figures and there were no errors when built. The ones I received were not put together correctly. Male's neck was over top of the chest. Female's shoulders are really messed up and do not move correctly. Wish I would have seen this prior to tearing open the boxes, can't really return them now):

PROS: the concept. Range of motion for the stand- stand can be posed in multiple ways, helpful for awkward positions. Small sizing is great!

CONS: unfortunately a lot... some joints are very loose and will not hold without support. Some joints are too tight! I don't mind the tight joints cause they hold but takes a while to get them to move and then you feel like you're breaking it, but you're not. Knees for the female are not as flexible like the males. My male neck is overtop of the chest, so I can't move the head. Shoulders on female are awkward and not correct- shoulders are not moveable. Loose parts feel like they fall apart any second. Not as moveable as the picture shown or the instructions show. Just poorly made and not worth the money.

I understand these figures are detailed in joint motion. They are also small. However, some toys are just as movable and have less problems.

Value for money - very poorly made, cost is too high for product rating.
Can tell they are mass produced and no quality check.
Would return and consider another brand if I didn't tear open the boxes in excitement. Excitement plummeted after trying to pose them in simply positions.

title: Worse than receiving it broken
text:
My daughter is a huge fan of Unicorns! and painting, and especially SEQUINS, GEMSTONES, AND ANYTHING METALLIC/(paints with that special hue. Well she was in tears when we finally decided to sit down and play/paint this christmas present. I was so glad it was not broken. Even if a horn had broken off, I am pretty handy with the krazy glue and after the painting, etc, I am sure she would hardly notice... but then... When I pulled out the metallic paint, she thought I was joking "no really mom, you can show me the metallic paint now.." but that was the metallic paint. I have to admit, it looks like normal paint to me too. I could see the tears welling up in her eyes.. but we tried to move on. Mom, what kind of Gemstones? I emptied the box upside down , "apparently none, I am sorry baby" one tear fell from her eye. yes she is spoiled, yes I tried to avoid that because I know it will only backfire later in life, but I split custody and have no control what goes on during half of her life. I do my best. When the sequins were also missing it was a total meltdown. I wish I had totally checked for all these things before setting it out to decorate, because I would have tried to hide it from my daughter and wished she forgot it existed.

I do not recommend , after seeing all the broken reviews, and they can forget 2 items obviously mentioned as essential parts of the kit. Also the metallic paint was heavily lacking.

Thanks for a traumatic experience.

text:
I've owed 5 bichon frise dogs throughout my life. Best dog breed ever! Though this CU-MATE stuffed animal is a Maltese, I ordered it anyway because it absolutely resembles a bichon. title: We Can't Stop Playing...400 Games...400!!!!
text:
When we were kids, my sister and I used to 'call' the front car seat whenever we traveled in the car. "I call the front seat!". I take no pride in admitting to you that since the Besosay Retra Handheld Game Console has arrived, my husband and I 'call' it in the same way we 'called' the front car seat. "I'm playing the console right after dinner!".

I kid you not. This system is SO much fun!

400 classic arcade games are on this small, lightweight device. I actually expected the screen to be black and white...its not! Its in color! It comes fully loaded and ready to play. The buttons are easy to use the screen is nice and clear. It even has sound! Its operated either using a lithium battery (included) or via a television where you can play on a big screen. (cable included!) We scrolled through the 400 games and found SO many familiar retro games but also a lot we've never heard of before. We haven't even played 1/2 the games yet!

I do have a small issue to mention, however. While it does come with instructions about the device itself, there are no instructions explaining what buttons should be used and how they work for each game. We had to play for awhile in order to figure out which buttons made a game jump, shoot, move, etc. Once we familiarized ourselves, we were good to go.

I am positively FLOORED at the unbelievably low price of this game console. It truly is a steal. It makes a wonderful gift even for those not familiar with retro video games. This delightful device literally provides hours and hours of entertainment. How could it not with 400 games? This is an item you don't need to waste anytime trying to decide if you should buy it or not.

BUY IT! You're going to LOVE it!
